All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcademManager
The AcademManager class represents a manager with academic-related responsibilities and the ability to view academic information.
CanViewAcademicInfo
The CanViewAcademicInfo interface defines the contract for classes that have the ability to view academic information.
CitationFormat
Citation Format shows 2 types of citations of research paper
ComplaintDecorator
The ComplaintDecorator class is a decorator for the Student class, adding the ability to send complaints to the dean.
Course
 
CourseRegistrationModel
 
Dean
The Dean class represents a dean within an educational institution, extending the functionality of the Employee class.
DiplomaProject
Diploma project class represents a diploma project of a graduate student
Employee
 
Faculty
The Faculty enum represents different academic faculties or departments.
GraduateStudent
The GraduateStudent class represents a graduate student who is also a researcher, extending the functionality of the Student class.
GraduateStudentBuilder
 
GraduateStudentType
The GraduateStudentType enum represents different types of graduate students, such as Master's or Ph.D.
IncorrectSupervisorError
Custom exception for when a graduate student's supervisor has h-index < 3
Languages
Enumerator of languages that system must support
Lesson
 
Main
 
Manager
The Manager class represents an abstract manager in the system.
ManagerType
The ManagerType enumeration represents the different types of managers in the system.
Mark
Class Mark represents a mark of a student
MarksDecorator
The MarksDecorator class is a decorator for the Student class, adding additional behavior for viewing marks.
MarkTypes
The MarkTypes enumeration represents different types of academic marks or assessments.
Message
The Message class represents a communication message, including its type, topic, urgency, text content, and sender.
MessageTest
 
MessageType
 
News
News class represents one News
NewsManager
 
NewsTopics
NewsTopics enumerator shows type of news
NotResearcherError
custom exception for when someone who is not a research tries to join a research project
Observer
The Observer interface represents an observer in the Observer design pattern.
ORManager
 
PaperCitationsComparator
Comparator helps to sort ResearchPaper based on their citation count in ascending order
PaperDateComparator
Comparator helps to sort ResearchPaper based on their publishedDate from oldest to newest
PaperLengthComparator
Comparator helps to sort ResearchPaper based on their text size count in ascending order
ResearcherCitesComparator
Comparator helps to sort ResearcherPersons based on their citation count in ascending order
ResearcherPerson
ResearcherPerson class represents a researcher with all its functionality, if other objects can become researchers, this object ads functionality
ResearchJournal
 
ResearchPaper
 
ResearchProject
 
Specialty
 
Student
 
StudentBuilder
StudentBuilder class is a Builder pattern, helps to create new instances of Student
StudentOrganization
 
Teacher
 
TeacherType
 
Test
 
Transcript
The Transcript class represents a student's academic transcript containing a mapping of courses to corresponding marks and the total credits earned.
UrgencyComplaint
 
UrgencyLevel
 
User
The User class represents a basic user in the system with common attributes and functionalities.
